description: A secondary antagonist of the series. He is the boss of the Blackbird Merchant Group, take an interest in Monica Bolst`s Super Refinement skill in order to use it for his weapons selling business. Taking advantage of the Bolts break up, he blackmailed Monica`s father into accepting constant abusive forging requests, in order to spare her. He maintains a weapon trading business with the Holy Sister, who asked him to kidnap Light Underwood.
name: Zamdo
